layer at (0,0) size 800x188

    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x156
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 240x19
          text run at (0,0) width 240: "The next two bars should be identical:"
